gamebit.BuzzerPitch: buzzer Emits a Pulse-width modulation (PWM) signal to the  pin8
gamebit.BuzzerPitch|param|frequency: frequency to modulate in Hz. eg:1000
gamebit.BuzzerPitch|param|ms: duration of the pitch in milli seconds.     eg:1000
gamebit.keyState: scan a button whether be triggered : return 'true' if pressed; return'false' if not.
